Debs Best Recipes  

Welcome

Welcome to our family recipe site!  The recipes you will find here are some of our favorites, and those our friends and family keep asking for.  We love experimenting with different flavors, colors and textures.  Many of  the recipes combine traditional European foods brought to the Canadian prairies with our ancestors, with foods, spices and herbs from around the world.   All recipes are developed with nutrition in mind, therefore processed foods and ingredients are avoided as much as possible.

Great food comes out of this kitchen!!
